entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Target Company. The page details its FY22L billings and highlights a successful switch in its business model leading to higher recurring billings.

entities.name: ChapsVision

Project codename for a transaction involving Articque as the target, with ChapsVision also mentioned in connection.

entities.name: Subscription
entities.description: A category of Articque's billings, representing 62% of FY22L total billings. Part of recurring software sales.

entities.name: Maintenance
entities.description: A category of Articque's billings, representing 20% of FY22L total billings. Part of recurring software sales.

entities.name: Professional Services
entities.description: A category of Articque's billings, representing 15% of FY22L total billings. Considered non-recurring.

entities.name: Perpetual Licenses
entities.description: A category of Articque's billings, representing 3% of FY22L total billings. Considered non-recurring.
Articque underwent a successful business model transformation, evidenced by the increase in recurring billings (e.g., 82% of billings in FY22L vs. 57% of revenues in FY19A).
